about_the_game:
The birds have caught your attention, their noise is tormenting—it’s time to scare them away!

Just a Little Purr suit is a turn-based strategy puzzle game. 20 handcrafted levels, a fun adventure designed for the whole family! With no time limit, you can choose a direction and use cards to perform an available action within the level, such as:

  • Common movement cards:

Cards that move the kitten forward by slots.

If in doubt, you can undo the action. The card will return to its initial position. Explore different solutions to the challenge!

  • Special Trampoline Card:

The direction cannot be chosen, but you can determine the distance. However, it will always move forward.

The environment will challenge you! Boosters can either help or hinder you by changing your position.

short_description: In Just a Little Purr_suit, use cards to guide the kitten along the path. Use cannons, trampolines, and even interdimensional portals to reach the bird as quickly as possible and scare it away.
